Package org.joty.workstation.app

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Application.PasswordValidator  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Application
    Application provides initialization of the main functionalities: detects the mode of running (desktop or web), manages the user's authentication, builds the asset of the application by loading data from the configuration file/s and from the user's home directory, loads the language vector depending on the choice made by the user, loads rarely changing data into memory from the database and keeps them in Application.LiteralStruct objects.
